channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole, 9th January
item.description:
Outside 163 Eldon Rd. Previous repairs have failed again. Pothole and road breaking up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham

item.title: Pot hole in road by keep clear markings, 9th January
item.description:
Pot hole in Westfield rd next to keep clear road makings. Was repaired (badly) a couple of weeks ago but has sunk and a new pot hole has appeared
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 9th January
item.description:
Customer has notified Chelt Borough Council that on his opinion a large tree is '..unstable at the root'. Tree approx 25 metres tall and same across.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes on m5, 9th January
item.description:
Coming to the direction of junction 11a northbound Between the 1 mile marker board to the 1/2 mile marker board lane 1 several potholes between the two signs. As you get to junction 11a there is another set of potholes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
